title: I need a pbe account

replies.body: I see that the account you're posting from has applied.  I'm not familiar with waves of invites going out, but I also don't really have details on how applicants are selected beyond our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  Best of luck with your application!
You can register anytime on their PBE sign up page. They will email you if you get accepted. It can take a long time to get in if you do get selected.
